message:
These shell commands are defined internally. Type `help' to see this list.
Type `help name' to find out more about the function `name'.
Available commands:
personality Show the list of Ukagaka's Personality
use [id...] Change the current personality that you want to edit.
create [name...]   Create a NEW personality
list [-m] [-all]   List the speech of current Personality or your submit
speech [sentence...] Input your Magic Words

这和 code 一点关系都没有啊

阿布拉其阿亚尔阿肯尔 说: 话说说这句话的我不是已经暴露我不会coding了吗 虽然还是想研究一下
早暴露了
不会没关系可以学，然而 chobits 真的和 code 没关系，除非你想把它弄到本地玩，那我建议你去搜搜春菜的相关资料了。
